headerText: Currently Freelancing for UX, UI, & Web Design Project. Invite me to join your team
footerAltText: Got a question or proposal, or just wantto say hello? Go ahead.

projects.name: Workintech
projects.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

personelInfo.education: Firat University, Software Engineering, Bachelor Degree, 2022
personelInfo.aboutMe: I was born on January 20, 1999, in Ortaköy, Aksaray, where I spent the early years of my education. I completed my undergraduate studies in Software Engineering at Fırat University, graduating in 2022 with a GPA of 2.76. Throughout my studies, I explored different programming languages, developed projects, and gained experience through internships. After graduation, I fulfilled my military service at the MSU Information Technology Department, serving as the Testing and Evaluation Supervisor. Now, I am focused on advancing my career in software development by learning new technologies.
